Node.definition: = a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside

= a hinged barrier at the entrance to a town, building, or room; ◄ usually made out of wood, but occasionally also out of metal; ► provides or prevents access; ≈ sometimes associated with vulnerability
= causative action by which humans or deities give someone else a certain responsibility or position of authority with regards to an object, a group of people, or an entire land or nation
= a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ brother of Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה)
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= various men; ► after exile
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= a fortress that commands a city and is used in the control of the inhabitants and in defense during attack or siege.
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to open the door or gate for (someone)
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans allow other humans entrance, passage, or access (in)to a building, construction, or area ◄ by opening a door or gate
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to be warm|to be hot|to become warm|to become hot
Node.definition: = process by which human or inanimate objects feel or become warm or hot
read עוֹד (עֹוד)
= causative action by which someone blocks the entrance, passage, or access (in)to a building, construction, or area ◄ with a door

= a hinged barrier at the entrance to a town, building, or room; ◄ usually made out of wood, but occasionally also out of metal; ► provides or prevents access; ≈ sometimes associated with vulnerability
= to cause a door to be kept firmly locked by securing it with an iron bar
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
literally: wide of hands; hence: = state in which a certain object has a relatively large distance from side to side
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
= small quantity of objects or substance

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals to come together as a group for a common purpose

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= person; ◄ belonging to the social class of the nobility ► and therefore often found in a position of authority; ≈ usually treated with respect

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a person of authority

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= process by which someone's name is put in a family register
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage
= book in which the names of people and their family relations were registered

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
literally: to find (in someone); hence: = process by which humans come upon certain information
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

literally: children of a town, region, nation; hence: = people, animals, or products that are inhabitants of or originating from a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the offspring of that place
= an adminstrative division of a country or a city

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= state in which people, animals or objects have been forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time
= man; ◄ son of Nabopolassar; ► king of Babylon (בָּבֶל) from 605 562 B.C. who led the people of Judah (יְהוּדָה) into exile
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= man; ► son of Shealtiel (שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל) or, according to of Pedaiah (פְּדָיָה) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► governor of Judea (יְהוּדָה) after the exile; according to , father of Meshullam (מְשֻׁלָּם) Hananiah (חֲנַנְיָה) and Shelomith (שְׁלֹמִית)

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= town; ◄ located in Babylon (בָּבֶל) ► from which a group of Jews (יְהוּדִי) returned to Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= town; ◄ located in Babylon (בָּבֶל) ► from which a group of Jews (יְהוּדִי) returned to Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= town; ◄ located in Babylon (בָּבֶל) ► from which a group of Jews (יְהוּדִי) returned to Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= town; ◄ located in Chaldea
= location

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group
= group of people that consider themselves descendants of one single ancestor

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► ancestor of a clan; after exile; his descendants were not able to prove their lineage
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► family head whose descendants were excluded from the priesthood in the time of Ezra (עֶזְרָא)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► family head; after exile
= state in which a countable entity is six in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which a countable entity is forty in number
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► family head; priests; after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► family head in charge of a division of priests (כֹּהֵן) time of David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ from Rogelim (רֹגְלִים) in Gilead (גִּלְעָד) ► an elder who supported king David (דָּוִד)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ descendant of priests (כֹּהֵן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► married one of the descendants of Barzillai from Rogelim (רֹגְלִים) and adopted his name; time after exile
= inhabitant or descendant of Gilead (גִּלְעָד) tribe and territory of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
literally: to be called; hence: = state in which a person is known with certain characteristics and treated as such
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another
= a reference to one's name in a written document
= process by which someone's name is put in a family register
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
literally: to treat as unclean; hence: = action by which someone is declared unfit for a certain position or task
= a role in which humans, through a process of ordination (מלא) and consecration (קדשׁ) are responsible for performing religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
exact meaning unsure: = person in a position of leadership among the Persians; ► used for Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה)
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = set consisting of two small objects; ► located in the breast piece on top of the ephod and used to determine God's will with regard to a certain matter
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = set consisting of two small objects; ► located in the breast piece on top of the ephod and used to determine God's will with regard to a certain matter
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= state in which a countable entity is ten thousand in number; ≈ associated with excessively high numbers by which the exact number is relatively unimportant
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which a countable entity is sixty in number
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which a countable entity is forty in number
= state in which a countable entity is five in number

= large quadruped mammal, which may reach a height of 2 m. or more; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; they are suited to life in desert areas, store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods, and can make long journeys through dry areas; ◄ Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; ► they are used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; their hair is woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; their milk is used as food and drink; ≈ they are a symbol of wealth and commerce, but unclean and not to be eaten
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= state in which a countable entity is five in number

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)
= state in which a countable entity is six in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry
exact meaning unsure: = person in a position of leadership among the Persians; ► used for Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה)
= place(s) where one's valuable goods are store
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= gold coin, used in Persian empire
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= metal container large enough to dip in with one's hands; ► used for sprinkling liquids such as water and blood
= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number

= an undergarment, ◄ woven of linen, ► and worn by the High Priest and his fellow priests; it was worn over the breeches (מִכְנָס) but from the waist up it was next to the skin; it was a kind of shirt and probably had long sleeves and reached nearly to the ankles and was held in place by a sash wound around the waist.
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry
= place(s) where one's valuable goods are store
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= gold coin, used in Persian empire
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= state in which a countable entity is ten thousand in number; ≈ associated with excessively high numbers by which the exact number is relatively unimportant
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= gold coin, used in Persian empire

= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= an undergarment, ◄ woven of linen, ► and worn by the High Priest and his fellow priests; it was worn over the breeches (מִכְנָס) but from the waist up it was next to the skin; it was a kind of shirt and probably had long sleeves and reached nearly to the ankles and was held in place by a sash wound around the waist.
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
literally, the ones given or the dedicated ones; hence = persons who were responsbile for doing regular tasks in the Temple and for serving the priests

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
literally: to reach; hence: = process by which a certain event reaches the time for it to take place
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
